amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title VII of division C, relating to coal leasing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 108-69 to strike Title VII of Division C (Federal Coal Leasing). Title VII would repeal the existing 160-acre limitation for lease modifications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 212 (Roll no. 143).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Rahall.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 212 (Roll no. 143).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
